Figure 18:On the left are original works by Vincent van Gogh; on the right, parallel recreations by Stable Diffusion, which incorporate the characteristic swirling of Starry Night despite its absence in the original images. (Items 49, 51 and 65 inhttps://ama2210.github.io/WikiArt_VLM_Web/.
